member.name: AUDIODESCRIPTION
member.summary: Contains information associated with audio descriptions. This structure is used with the function when the SPI_GETAUDIODESCRIPTION or SPI_SETAUDIODESCRIPTION action value is specified.

member.name: AUDIODESCRIPTION.cbSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes. The caller must set this member to sizeof(AUDIODESCRIPTION).

member.name: AUDIODESCRIPTION.Enabled
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, audio descriptions are enabled; Otherwise, this member is FALSE.

member.name: AUDIODESCRIPTION.Locale
member.summary: The locale identifier (LCID) of the language for the audio description. For more information, seeLocales and Languages.
